STRINGS.CRIT_DIE: [color=#4cf]On [shake]critical[/shake] hit:[/color] Consume all Critical to deal +50% damage per Critical consumed.

STRINGS.FIRST_DIE: [wave]This is a description[/wave]. On hit: Apply [hint=This displays a hint.]Vulnerable[/hint] and gain 2 Haste.

STRINGS.LETHAL_HIT_CYCLING: [color=#4cf]On [shake]critical[/shake] hit[/color]: Cycle this die (up to 2 times).

STRINGS.CLASH_LOSS_DIE: On clash lose: Discard all remaining dice on this ability.
